title: Frame Rate dropping Issue
body: After Patching 7.24, I played two games in a row where every time I moved my mouse, my frame rate would drop to the lowest 10fps. This has only occurred in this patch ever. I have never had an issue like this before.

replies.body: I'd consider running a quick repair and also checking for any possible missed diver updates as well. There might be some files that aren't working properly causing those weird fps stutters. If those don't seem to help at all make sure you also run through the steps in this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as well to cover the rest of the basics.
Could you explain to me what are missed diver updates. Also, I will check out the fps guide. Thanks for the help!
Is your fps fine when you don't move your mouse?
Yes. My FPS is perfect fine when I don't move my mouse.
